column5: Hello everyone, My name is Sean and I am a 14 year old steelheader. I just started out this year and I really enjoy it. I started with a spinning reel but switched over to a centrepin and I love it. I usually go to rivers near me like the Bronte, the Grand and the Credit and sometimes on weekends I go up north to the Saugeen or Beaver. In the summer I do some bass and walleye fishing in my families 14' boat and I also do some fly fishing, usually the upper grand or whitemans creek.  I have been on this site a ton and finally joined. I really enjoy all the stories and pictures that people post, and the classifieds. Hopefully an Islander will pop up soon  Sean  If I can figure this out, here are some pics of some steelhead I caught this winter (Sorry about the quality)
Nice fish dude, and welcome to the club. You'll learn a lot here!
Welcome aboard Sean.  Some nice chrome you got there. Thx for sharing the pictures with us.
Welcome aboard Sean ! Looks like you will be showing us a thing or 2 before long!!  Tite lines!!!

Welcome to the board Sean but ya spelt your name wrong LOL I'm a Shawn too but I will let it go because your a steelheader   Lookin forward to your spring pics have fun on here and don't be scared to ask ??? there's a tonne of experienced pinners on here myself included been steelheading for 15+ years and had my pin for 6ish years I love it one of my favorite fish to catch
Hi Sean. I fished all those creeks too as a 14 year old but alas that was way to many years ago now. Welcome aboard, I hope you find your stay enjoyable.
" (Sorry about the quality)"  They SURE look like quality fish to me....nice going....  :clapping:
welcome aboard, those are some great lookin fish!
Hi Sean  Welcome from another newbie.  Cheers glenn
Nice to have you here Sean, some great looking fish you have there!
That third fish is a beauty!!  Can't wait to see what you get this spring
Well Done Young man...your in the right sport and targeting the right fish with the right technique...once again....Well Done!

buddy! I've got 14 years on ya and you've caught more steelies than me!    I used to live in port credit and fished the lower stretches of the river quite a bit! Mostly for pike, smallies, carp and.....walleye believe it or not! welcome aboard!
welcome sean, maybe we'll run into each other on the river. Great looking steelies you got there.
Welcome to OFC Sean Nice steelhead and thanks for sharing the pics with us!!! Looking forward to reading your adventures along the river banks Leechman
Hey there Sean Welcome to the site. I'm new to this site as well and it's by far the best site, I have had lots of help on any of my questions and I think you will enjoy this site as much as I do.
Hey Sean! Looking forward to some pics from  ya!  TDunn
Welcome aboard I'm sure you'll enjoy your stay, think about joining the OFC Tourney any team would be glad to have you SBK
